name: Dr Markus Kaum
goal: Providing expert advice on specific matters and subjects, esp. legal advice, and contribute to the discussion of European projects, foster European cooperation and help to the development of pan-European projects and legislation with a focus on corporate governance, corporate law and capital markets and finance law.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives:
Corporate governance and corporate law
Capital Markets Union
Finance Law
